snippet.title: DRAKE RPG Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
DRAKE is a Sci-Fi Action RPG set on a distant desert planet. 
Wishlist now - https://steam.drake-game.com

This game is about humanity that forgot how to be humans in a constant rush for resources, power and control. You will face something that will radically change humanity. But what that change will be - it's up to you to decide. Drake is a game about choices, perseverance and fighting for survival.

Use your Strength, Intelligence or Charisma to uncover the secrets that are hidden under the planet’s crust. Shape the look of humanity in first contact and try to survive in a harsh Space Western World.

Join our community and follow the development:
https://discord.com/invite/EbBurAkFb3
https://twitter.com/drakethegame
https://www.facebook.com/Drake.SteamGame
https://www.instagram.com/drake.game/
https://vk.com/drake.game
